title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630, subpt. 1630-4 - Operating Period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630, subpt. 1630-4 - Operating Period

State Regulations
§ 1630-4.1 - Fire and extended coverage insurance
§ 1630-4.2 - Compensation insurance
§ 1630-4.3 - Owners', landlords', tenants' public liability insurance
§ 1630-4.4 - Mobile equipment insurance
§ 1630-4.5 - Boiler insurance
§ 1630-4.6 - Robbery and safe burglary insurance
§ 1630-4.7 - Fidelity bond
§ 1630-4.8 - Review of preconstruction and construction period insurance
§ 1630-4.9 - Repair and alteration work on other contractors

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630, subpt. 1630-4

Approximately two months before it is anticipated that
any portion of completed project will be ready for acceptance by authority from
building construction contractor, authority shall proceed to obtain bids for
its insurance requirements during operating period in accordance with Subpart
1630- 1. The division will cooperate with the authority in preparing
specifications for information of insurance carriers invited to submit
quotations. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
